Summary: Generic/EvdevMouse plugin: Implement support for more buttons on "mouse" devices (16+4 buttons)
Creator: Richard Stockton

Comments.Author: Richard Stockton
Comments.Comment:
The patch which implements this change will be nearly identical to the change which I recently made in the Wayland plugin. See https://bugreports.qt-project.org/browse/QTBUG-22760 and http://codereview.qt-project.org/#change,16370 as references for Wayland.

The code builds and attempts to run properly, but my own X11/KWin environment keeps the mouse in a grabbed State (the device is thus not available to this plugin.

Comments.Author: Richard Stockton
Comments.Comment: Bug Status should be 'Verified' for 5.0.0. Change-Id: Ib8cbb9500280c76f06a51ce95095e22ae84de1c6
